00186             inline irr::scene::IVertexBuffer& IRRBuffer::getVertexBuffer()
00187             {
00188                         return meshBuffer.getVertexBuffer();
00189             }

00201             inline void IRRBuffer::setUsed(size_t nb)
00202             {
00203                         if (nb > nbParticles) // Prevents the buffers from growing
00204                                     nb = nbParticles;
00205 
00206                         getVertexBuffer().set_used(nb * particleVertexSize);
00207                         getIndexBuffer().set_used(nb * particleIndexSize);
00208             }
00209 
00210             inline bool IRRBuffer::areVBOInitialized() const
00211             {
00212                         return VBOInitialized;
00213             }
00214 
00215             inline void IRRBuffer::setVBOInitialized(bool init)
00216             {
00217                         VBOInitialized = init;
00218             }
